scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.lint:backend: nvm use 20.0.0 && cd sandbox-backend/functions && npm run lint
scripts.lint:frontend: nvm use 20.11.1 && cd sandbox-frontend && npm run lint
scripts.test:frontend: nvm use 20.11.1 && cd sandbox-frontend && npm run test
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.build:backend: nvm use 20.0.0 && cd sandbox-backend/functions && npm run build
scripts.build:frontend: nvm use 20.11.1 && cd sandbox-frontend && npm run build
